#summary Installation Instructions

= Manual Installation =

 # Download the latest copy, currently version .1: http://coredatalibrary.googlecode.com/files/CoreDataLibrary%20Template.1.zip

# Extract the archive

# Place the folder inside the /Developer/Platforms/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer/Library/Xcode/Project Templates/Application/ folder (or wherever you have the Developer tools installed).

# When you create a new project from within XCode you will see the "CoreDataLibrary Application" template.

= Automated Installation =

 # Replace step 3 by downloading the Automater application that performs the copy for you http://coredatalibrary.googlecode.com/files/Project%20Installer.zip.

 # Drag the CoreDataLibrary Application folder onto the Project Installer application.
